snippet.title: Yume Nikki Fangame playthrough - XV ver. 0.00
snippet.description:
Read more about this fangame: https://ynfg.yume.wiki/XV
Download: https://xv.itch.io/xv
Check out the Dream Diary Jam 1 page!: https://itch.io/jam/dream-diary-jam
Notes (SPOILERS!!):

I've found that the correct solution to solving the main puzzle is different each time you play. While practicing for this playthrough, I had to wear different colored hair and contacts to achieve the ending. But thankfully, I THINK if I recall correctly the NPC who told the truth turned out to be the same for this recording. And as it turns out, the eyeball NPC that gives the Contacts effect has a different color upon each playthrough but I'm assuming it always gives you the correct color. So, you only need to worry about which wig dye to wear.
(If I am wrong about any of this and you have more accurate info, please let me know!!)
